## Heirloom Tomatoes

**Some helpful data that was found**

[Farmers Market Prices](https://practicalfarmers.org/2015/06/farmers-market-prices-dsm-and-around-iowa/):\
At the 2015 PFI Annual Conference, Kay Jensen collected farmers' vegetable prices. Recent data shows price ranges for tomatoes, ranging from \$2.50 to \$4 per pound.

[Expatistan](https://www.expatistan.com/price/tomatoes/des-moines):\
Tells the price of 1 kg (2 lb.) of tomatoes in Des Moines IA can be used to find other prices located in IA.

[AgMRC](https://www.agmrc.org/commodities-products/vegetables/tomatoes):\
Provides a some detailed and helpful references for tomatoes.

[Market Maker](https://ia.foodmarketmaker.com/business/search?qb=eyJzZWFyY2hUZXJtIjoiSGVpcmxvb20gVG9tYXRvZXMifQ):\
A potential source to find and locate local farmers that grow Heirloom Tomatoes.

[Local Harvest](https://www.localharvest.org/search.jsp?jmp&scale=7&lat=41.657959&lon=-91.52806&nm=heirloom+tomatos):\
A potential source to find and locate local farmers that grow Heirloom Tomatoes.

[Practical farmers](https://practicalfarmers.org/):\
A potential source to find and locate local farmers that grow Heirloom Tomatoes.

[Instacart](https://www.instacart.com/products/3133368-heirloom-tomatoes-per-lb):\
A cite that could be of use to find Items.

[NFMD](https://nfmd.org/ia/fort-dodge/1000603/): \
Market on Central - Farmers Market in Historic Downtown Fort Dodge

**Potential Useful Sources**

[National Retail Report - Specialty Crops](https://www.marketnews.usda.gov/mnp/fv-report-retail?repType=&run=&portal=fv&locChoose=&commodityClass=&startIndex=1&type=retail&class=VEGETABLES&commodity=TOMATOES&region=MIDWEST+U.S.&organic=ALL&repDate=&endDate=&compareLy=No) ( [USDA Fruits & Vegetables Market Report](https://www.agmrc.org/fruit-and-vegetable-market-data?StartDate=2023-05-23&EndDate=2023-05-29&RegionIDs=3&CommodityIDs=67&VarietyIDs=53&UnitIDs=24&page=1&items=25) ):\
Advertised Prices for Specialty Crops at Major Retail Supermarket Outlets it contains Heirloom Tomatoes but only specifies the Midwest U.S.

[FRED Economic Data](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/APU0000712311):\
Contains the average Price of Tomatoes( Tomatoes, Field Grown (Cost per Pound/453.6 Grams) in U.S. City Average) All fresh field grown and vine ripened round red tomatoes. Includes organic and non-organic.

[Farmers Market Nutrition Program](https://data.iowaagriculture.gov/fmnp/): Lists farmers markets in Iowa
